title: Anime Himitsu no Hanazono (The Secret Garden)
synopsis: Every child deserves to have a fun and carefree childhood. Unfortunately, life is not always fair, as is the case with Mary Lennox. At a very young age, Mary loses her parents to a disease, leaving her traumatized and orphaned. From India, she is brought to England with her uncle who has taken on the role of her new guardian.
voices: ['Tominaga, Miina', 'Naya, Rokurou', 'Tanaka, Mayumi', 'Kamei, Yoshiko', 'Satou, Masamichi', 'Katsuki, Masako', 'Nakazawa, Midori', 'Takano, Urara', 'Saka, Osamu', 'Aoki, Kazuyo']
